download bootstrapper:
What anti-virus are you using? Antiviruses like McAfee, Bitdefender, Norton or Kaspersky may have to be uninstalled due to interfering with Synapse heavily. to uninstall an antivirus: Press the Windows key +r, then type in appwiz.cpl in the textbox, click ok, then find your antivirus and click it to uninstall it. If you don't have any other anti-virus, make sure windows defender real-time protection is off. here's a video on how to permanently turn it off. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FmjblGay3AM

if that didn't work, download, setup, and run protonvpn by clicking quick connect, http://protonvpn.com/, then delete the bin folder and run synapse x as an administrator.

If those don't work, reinstall synapse from scratch. Heres a link to the download:
https://mega.nz/#!mNEQRaBT!LmoibSBzCG8MNnsCffrIJLse-acuS8GOBtjS8cgruBg.

If those don't work, make sure your Windows 10 is up to date.

It's also recommended to try deleteing bin and then running synapse x as admin after trying a fix / before doing any fixes.
C2-2:
Could you press win  r , then type %appdata% go to Discord, then go to folder "0.0.306", then "modules", and then "discord_desktop_core" 
Right click on "index.js" and click edit make sure it only says "module.exports = require('./core.asar');"
Checking status:
Could you check if you have any antiviruses enabled, or installed for that matter, If you do its highly recommended to uninstall them if possible, as sometimes even when disabled they will continue to block/delete necessary parts of synapse x.
You can find all the antivirus programs you currently have installed by doing the following:
Press Windows key + R, then a dialogue box  should come up and you need to enter "appwiz.cpl" into it, once you have done that press enter and you should see all currently installed programs.

If you have confirmed that all antiviruses are disabled / uninstalled and it still doesn't work try the following few fixes:

1. Download and install ProtonVPN (https://www.protonvpn.com/), It is a free to use vpn which you can use to mask what you do online, which your ISP might be interfering with. 
2. Check if Windows is updated. 

After trying the fixes i would recommend deleting the bin folder to get a fresh installation of synapse x.
Inj crash:
This could be caused due to one of your scripts in the auto exec folder

If not then check if you have any antiviruses enabled, or installed for that matter, If you do its highly recommended to uninstall them if possible, as sometimes even when disabled they will continue to block/delete necessary parts of synapse x.
You can find all the antivirus programs you currently have installed by doing the following:
Press Windows key + R, then a dialogue box  should come up and you need to enter "appwiz.cpl" into it, once you have done that press enter and you should see all currently installed programs.

If you don't have any antivirus running then create a new user account which is admin, and then install synapse on that account. Heres a guide https://support.microsoft.com/en-gb/help/4026923/windows-10-create-a-local-user-or-administrator-account
Black box:
Could you download and install vc redist. You will need both x64 and x86, You can find the download for both of them here:
https://aka.ms/vs/16/release/vc_redist.x86.exe
https://aka.ms/vs/16/release/vc_redist.x64.exe
https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/2977003/the-latest-supported-visual-c-downloads

Once you've installed both of them reboot your pc.

After rebooting delete bin and run synapse x.exe as admin
Javascript Error:
Could you try to reinstall both roblox and Synapse, once reinstalled both of them reboot your pc

if that didn't work could you try downloading and setting up proton vpn  (http://protonvpn.com/), once set up connect to it and run synapse x.exe as admin.

And if that didn't work try deleting bin and run synapse x.exe as admin.

and if all of the other fixes didn't work and you had the ui open, try switching to legacy ui.

As a last resort you can make a new user account which is administrator and download and install synapse on it. You can find how to create a new user here:
https://support.microsoft.com/en-gb/help/4026923/windows-10-create-a-local-user-or-administrator-account

synapse account err:
Have you shared your synapse account? 

If not go to Settings > System > About and select the Rename PC button in the right column under PC. Then type the name you want to rename the computer. Once entered, restart your PC.
User Account:
Could you create a new windows user account which is an admin, you can find a guide on how to do that here:
https://support.microsoft.com/en-gb/help/4026923/windows-10-create-a-local-user-or-administrator-account
Inactive: This ticket has been closed due to inactivity. Feel free to create another ticket with the same question if your issue wasn't resolved.
Discord Invite: Could you join this discord server and ask one of the currently online staff to give you an invite? https://discord.gg/NzWWzUF
Reinstall: Could you close synapse and delete the bin folder in your synapse directory, after deleting bin run synapse x.exe as admin.
